doc.name: wstoken
doc.parameters:
name = e.g. tokenfield[]

allowtags = (no value) Allow to create values that do not exist

allowclear = allow user to clear his selection (for json ajax calls)

template = ?

id = mandatory

json= e.g. /realtimer.php?tt=Official

callback = templateCallBack

multiple = (no value)

placeholder =

class = 

data-origID =
doc.example:
<wstoken name="tokenfield[]" id="tokener" json="/realtimer.php?tt=Official" template="test" callback="templateCallBack" placeholder="Choose MF" multiple allowtags>
</wstoken>

<wstoken placeholder="Select jurisdiction" class="form-control" name="Jurisdiction" id="jurisdiction-select-{{#var:@id}}" json="/realtimer.php?tt=Jurisdiction&tr=name:::text,level:::text,jurisdiction id:::id&ds= (&de=)" required>
{{#if:{{#var:@jurisdictiondetails}}|
{{#arraymap:{{#var:@jurisdictiondetails}}|^|@@STRING@@|{{#tag:wsfield|{{#explode:@@STRING@@|@@|1}}|type=option|value={{#explode:@@STRING@@|@@|2}}|selected=selected }}|}}
}}<!-- ./ if jurisdiction details -->
</wstoken>
